title: [Health] Cough is one of the most frequent symptom for which patients seek medical consultation, though its presentation and frequency patterns over time have never been analysed. Cough counts for respiratory wellness as step counts for physical activity might soon become a norm.

[Neuroscience] Cambridge scientists have shown that it may be possible to spot signs of brain impairment in patients as early as nine years before they receive a diagnosis for one of a number of dementia-related diseases
